column5: Study MSc Integrative Counselling and Psychotherapy with us and gain the skills you need to practise as a therapist. The University of Wolverhampton’s proven programme incorporates best practice from psychology, psychotherapy and healthcare fields, preparing you for professional positions within the thriving area of counselling.
column7: Home - Full-time - £11550 per year Home - Part-time - £5775 per year International - Full-time - £15450 per year
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
